article:
The 'Millennium Product' status was awarded by the Design Council to British
products and companies which show "imagination, ingenuity and inspiration" as
well as "innovation, creativity and design". http://www.prnewswire.co.uk/cg-
i/news/release?id=12341 http://www.designcouncil.org.uk/about-us/our-
history/millennium-products/

The products were exhibited adjacent to the Millennium Dome during 2000.
headings: Among the 1,012 products, notable Millennium Product award winners include
